mapper.sql: instorage.is_id, instorage.bo_id, instorage.is_operator_id, instorage.goods_id, instorage.is_time, instorage.is_number, instorage.is_afterNumber, instorage.is_note, instorage.is_operator_name, instorage.is_goods_price, instorage.is_goods_total, goods.goods_id,goods.category_id,goods.supplier_id,goods.goods_name,goods.goods_barcode, goods.goods_salePrice, goods.goods_specification,goods.goods_metricUnit, goods.goods_buyPrice, goods.goods_memPrice, goods.goods_destination, goods.goods_producePlace,goods.goods_category, goods.goods_supplier, goods.goods_material, goods.goods_brand, goods.goods_picture, goods.goods_create_time
instorage left join goods on instorage.goods_id = goods.goods_id
mapper.select:
select
from
and outstorage.os_operator_name like concat(concat('%',#{operatorName}),'%')
and outstorage.goods_id = #{goodsId}
and goods.goods_name = concat(concat('%',#{goodsName}),'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(instorage.is_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(in.is_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')

mapper.update:
update instorage
bo_id = #{boId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_operator_id = #{isOperatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where is_id = #{isId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
